unnormalised: ### Mhaka Eka Silent Killeracho Anubhav: Tumchea 30s-ant Kallzachem Arogya Samajun Ghea
normalised: ### Mhaka Eka Silent Killeracho Anubhav: Tumchea Tisrea Pirayer Kalzachi Samball

unnormalised: Hanchi survat eka trasdayak thakanntlean zali. Hanv, Rohan Verma, 32 vorsancho, apleak sodanch ekdom fit mantalo. Dor eka Saturday-Sunday-ak cricket khelltalo, zdrav jeevon jevncheak proytn kortalo (chodd korun!), ani sadharonnponnan aplea zdravponnachi chinta korinaslo. Magir, sumar 6 mhoinea adim, mhaka karnn divonk nokllo aso thakonn zatale. Kamachea tanak lagun asa mhonn mantalem, deran ratik Netflix polleun, sadharonn somestancho mhaka tras zatale.
normalised: Mhaji survat zal'li thaknun. Hanv, Rohan Verma, battis vorsam, hanv apleak sodanch fit mantalo. Dor etvaraak cricket khelltalo, bore jevnn jevonk yatn kortalo (chodd korun!), ani sadharonnponni mhaka mhojea tabyetichi chinta naxil'li. Punn, sumar so mhoinea adim, mhaka nirmoll thakvot zaitoli oxem distalem. Mhaka distalem tem kamachea tanachea karnnan, ratchim der raun Netflix polleun, sadharonn karnnan zaitolem.

unnormalised: Punn ho thakonn choluch raulo. To fakt lamb disak thakun zaunk naslo; ti ek hadd-bhitli tras asli ji purnn ratiche zhopem uprant-ui vochonasli. Magir dukh zaleak mhaka dums dums lagtale. Bandrantlea mhojea apartamentachea 3 pajreancher choddop Mt. Everest cher choddlolea vori distalem. Kitem tori khotter zalem mhonn mhaka dislem.
normalised: Punn thakvot urli. Tem fokot lamb disacho thakvot naxillo; tem haddantlean yetalem ani eke ratri zop zalea uprantuy tem rokhddench zaitolem. Magir mhaka dumo zatolo. Bandrant mhojea apartamentachea tin payreo choddop Mount Everest choddlea bhaxen distalem. Kaim tori chukichem aslem.

unnormalised: Mhoji baiko, Priya, ji veglli buddhi vaparta ti, hannem mhaka doctorak mellpak sodle. Hanvem tanka der korun ghetlem, tumka khobor asa, â€œtech bhitar aamkam sadhi zateli," "hanv porthun mhojea rutinant yeteli." Nimannem, gully cricket khelltoleari dhakka laglo (mhojea ixttank hasi ani kallji disli), hanvem mandun ghetlem.
normalised: Mhaji bail, Priya, je praktikal asa, tinnem mhaka doktora kodden vochpak sanglem. Hanv tem pusaritalom, tumaka khobor asa, "tem fokot eka phase," "hanv rokhddench mhojea routineak porttolom." Nimannem, eka khas kricket khelltana hanv poddlo (mhojea ixttanchea ananda khatir, ani chinte khatir), hanv manlo.

unnormalised: Mhojea GP, Dr. Sharma, hannem rutin test keli. Sogllim sadhi dislem, fattir chodd cholesterol distalem. Tannem fattir dollo marlo, hem jevnachea karnnak lagun zata mhonn sanglo, ani jeevonak bodol korchea khatir sall dilo. Hanvem proytn kelo, hanvem khorench kelo. Butter chicken katrilo (ek dukachi vostu, hanv zannam!), vegim vegim joging korpak survat keli. Punn hem tras choluch ravlem.
normalised: Mhojea G-P, Doktor Sharma, hannem kaim routine test keli. Soglle sadharonn distale, thoddem vaddoilelem cholesterol soddun. Tinnem tem soddun dilem, tinnem sangilem tem aharak lagun zata ani jivitache pod'dotint bodol korpak sanglem. Hanv yatn kelo, hanv khorench kelo. Hanvem butter chickenacho vapor komi kelo (eka tragedy, mhaka khobor asa!), hanvem thoddem zoggink suru kelem. Punn lakxann urli.

unnormalised: Magir, eka sanjecher, mhaka kallzachem dukonn zalem. Ek tikh, tokhli dukhi ji mhojea davea hatak vota. Bhirant bhitar poddli. Hem sadhi thakonn naslem. Aamkam Lilavati Hospitalant zai poddlem.
normalised: Magir, eke sanje, mhaka kallzak dukhole. Eke tikxnn, katari dukhi ji mhajea davea hatak geli. Bhoy suru zalo. Hem fokot thakvot naxil'lem. Ami rokhddench Lilavati Hospitalant paule.

unnormalised: ER doctor, Dr. Patel, ek vichar korop naslo, tannem veginuch ECG divpak hukum dilo. Nati bori nasli. Dislem, mhaka eka coronary artery-ant blockage aslem. Hanv kallzachea trasak tenko dito. 32 vorsancher!
normalised: E-R doktor, Doktor Patel, ek no-nonsense monis, tannem rokhddench E-C-G korpak sangli. Result boro naxillo. Mhaka dista, mhajea eka coronary arteryant blockage asa. Hanv heart attackacho samno kortalo. Battis vorsanche pirayer!

unnormalised: Fattirchea don-tin disamni test, sall maslo, ani vaddta tan bhair aile. Hanvem angiography, angioplasty, stents vixim xikpachea khatir melltolem - ulovnni ji mhoje khatir eka satteam adim puriponnan pardeshi asli. Dr. Patel sangtale ki jitleari hanv tornatto asleari, gharaanni itihas (mhojea ajeak kallzache dukonn aslem), tan, ani telanchea rostachea jevnachea mogakui hem karnn zata.
normalised: Fuddlim kaim dis testam, salah ani vaddoilelea chintechea bhongarak lagle. Mhaka angiography, angioplasty, stents vishim mahiti mell'li - te utram mhaka eka satolle adim purem nove asle. Doktor Patel hannem sangilem ki hanv tornatto aslo tori, kutumbachi itihas (mhajea azok kalzachea rogacho tras aslo), tan, ani telantle jevnnachem prokran mhaka tras zalo.

unnormalised: Hanvem angioplasty keli. Ek lhan stent ghalun band zatilolem artery ugddap kelo. Ho upchar fattir khotter naslo, devak dhanyvad. Fattirchea trasak unne zalem. Kallzachem dukonn gayab zalam, ani hanv porthun zannven zheun shaktele.
normalised: Hanvem angioplasty keli. Eka lhan stentak blockage dhaktalo korpak lavlo. Te procedure itli vait naxil'li, devak dhanyvad. Uprant mhaka khub tras komi zalo. Kallzachi dukh pois zali, ani hanv portun sokasen jivo gheu shak'ko.

unnormalised: Sudrant tras zatalo punn adhi sthir zatalo. Hanvem mhojea jeevonachea tornnant bodol korpak zai aslem. Hanvem vokhto gheunk survat keli, eka sadhi dos Aspirin 75mg gheunk survat keli. Hanvem hospitalachea dietician-n dilolo diet gheunk survat kelo, ani cardiac rehab program-ant vantto ghetlo.
normalised: Sudharop dhimem punn sthir aslem. Mhaka mhojea jivitachim pod'dotam bodlok poddlim. Hanvem Aspirin seventy five milligramsak dhor dis ghevpak suru kelem. Hanvem hospitalantlean mell'lolo diet plan vaprunk laglo, ani eka cardiac rehab programak bhorti zalo.

unnormalised: Atam, fattirchea kaim mhoineamni, mhaka navi vyakti vori dista. Hanv mhojea xorirachea vixim, mhojea limitations-anchea vixim, ani kallzak samballncheachi mahatva samajun ghetam. Mhojea cardiologist, Dr. Menon, Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital-ant, niyomit check-up-anchea mahatvak tenko dita, khas korun tankam zanka gharant kallzachem dukonn asa. To dor 6 mhoineamni lipid profile test korpak ani dor eka vorsak ECG korpak sangta.
normalised: Atam, kaim mhoinea uprant, hanv eka novea monxaso distam. Hanv mhojea angak, mhojea limit ani mhojea kalzachi samball korpachi mahatvak zannva asa. Mhojea cardiologist, Doktor Menon, Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospitalant, tannem dor vorsa doctoranche lagim vochon tabiyet zanchun gheupak sanglam, khas korun jenna tumchea familik heart diseaseacho tras aslo. To dor so mhoinea uprant lipid profile test, ani dor vorsa E-C-G korpak sangat.

unnormalised: Mhojea anubhav ek xikpak dileli ghanti asli. Kallzachem dukonn ek famkar vyaktichench tras na. Tem konacheai pirayer dhakka ditam. Vegim zannar ani jeevonachea tornnant bodol korpak zai. Tumchea 30s-ant astani, zitleari tumka zdrow distalem, daya korun, tumchi test korun ghea. Tem tumche jivit vachoita. Uzo gheunchea kallzak zor asta mhonn uktem korat!
normalised: Mhojea anubhav mhaka zagrut korpachi ghatna asli. Heart disease mhataryanche problem naxim. Tem konnak tori konnachea pirayeruy zau shak'ta. Rokhddench to sollyo melloun gheupak ani jivitachim pod'dotam bodolop mahatvachem asa. Taka lagun, tumchim tisrea pirayer asa, tum soddench bore distat tori, tumchem check-up korun ghya. Tenam tumchem jinn vatauncho asta. Ugddas dovrat, eka bore kalzache zor dharonn asta!
